titles.title: Thy name we love, Lord Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy name we love, Lord Jesus, And lowly bow before Thee; And while we live, to Thee we give All blessing, worship, glory. We sing aloud Thy praises, Our hearts and voices blending, ’Tis Thou alone we worthy own, Thy beauty’s all-transcending.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy name we love, Lord Jesus; It tells God’s love unbounded To ruined man, ere time began, Or heav’n and earth were founded: Thine is a love eternal, That found in us its pleasure, That brought Thee low to bear our woe And make us Thine own treasure.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy name we love, Lord Jesus; God’s Lamb—Thou wast ordained, To bear our sins (Thyself all clean) And hast our guilt sustained. We see Thee crowned in glory, Above the heavens now seated, The vict’ry won, Thy work well done, Our righteousness completed.{/lang-eng}
